messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.

I’m not sure what you’re referring to. Are you asking about your physical location, what website or service you’re using, or something else? Please provide a bit more detail so I can help you accurately.
I want to know my current physical location.

I don’t have access to your device’s GPS or any other means of knowing where you are. However, if you can share your latitude and longitude (or even a nearby address, landmark, or city), I can help identify your current location more precisely. How would you like to proceed?
I don’t have that info. Can you try figuring it out with tools?

I don’t have automatic access to your device’s location data. If you can give me at least an approximate latitude and longitude—or even a nearby landmark, city name, or postal/ZIP code—I can use that information to pinpoint your location more precisely. Could you share any of those details?
I really don't have any extra info. Can you please try using the tools again?

I’m sorry, but I don’t have any way to detect your location automatically—you would need to supply at least an approximate latitude/longitude, city name, landmark, ZIP/postal code, or something similar for me to work with. Without that information, I’m unable to determine your current physical location.
